Jeremy Tinianow
Hello.

My name’s Jeremy. I am a cross-disciplinary designer with a focus on bridging the gap between digital and physical. Currently a student at Boulder Digital Works, I'm on an ambiguous path with a specific goal: to explore how technology informs design, and vice versa.

I'm always on the lookout for new opportunities & challenges. Don’t be shy.
